Victoria.KITE (AM):
KITE (1410 AM) is a radio station licensed to Victoria, Texas, United States, the station serves the Victoria TX area. The station is currently owned by Victoria Radioworks, LLC.


== Translator ==
The station is also heard on 97.5 FM, through a translator in Victoria, Texas.


== History of call letters ==
The call letters KITE were previously assigned to an AM station in Kansas City.
